alert.note: Alert for Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 3:44AM EST until December 01 at 12:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of around 3 inches across the northwest half of the county and lesser amounts elsewhere. * WHERE...Warren County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Slowed travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will be gusting into the 30s at times.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts will include snow covered roads and limited visibility in some areas. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
